rules_text:
Enchant permanent
As long as enchanted permanent is a creature it has menace and “Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, create a Treasure token.” [i](It’s an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.”)[/i]
When enchanted permanent is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.
notes: 2.2.1: Got changed from utterly crushing to a mostly functional reprint of sticky fingers that can go on your vehicles.
